languages.text: "Я был снисходителен, это правда. И в итоге поплатился за это — посмотрите на разруху вокруг, бунтовщики почти ничего не оставили от моего дома..." {n}Последние слова хранитель произносит с особой горечью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я был снисходителен, это правда. И в итоге поплатился за это — посмотрите на разруху вокруг, бунтовщики почти ничего не оставили от моего дома..." {n}Последние слова хранитель произносит с особой горечью.{/n}

languages.text: "I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я был снисходителен, это правда. И в итоге поплатился за это — посмотрите на разруху вокруг, бунтовщики почти ничего не оставили от моего дома..." {n}Последние слова хранитель произносит с особой горечью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I was lenient, this is true. And in the end I paid the steep price — just look at the ruin surrounding us, the mutineers have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with a particular bitterness.{/n}

"I was lenient, this is true. And in the end I paid the steep price — just look at the ruin surrounding us, the mutineers have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with a particular bitterness.{/n}

"I was lenient, this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the ruin around us, the insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with a particular bitterness.{/n}

"I was lenient, this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the ruin around us, the insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with a particular bitterness.{/n}

"I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

"I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich war gnädig, das ist wahr. Und ich habe letztlich einen hohen Preis dafür bezahlt. Seht Euch nur die Zerstörung um uns herum an. Die Aufständischen haben von meiner Heimat so gut wie nichts stehen lassen ..." {n}Der Hüter spuckt die letzten Worte mit einer besonderen Verbitterung aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich war gnädig, das ist wahr. Und ich habe letztlich einen hohen Preis dafür bezahlt. Seht Euch nur die Zerstörung um uns herum an. Die Aufständischen haben von meiner Heimat so gut wie nichts stehen lassen ..." {n}Der Hüter spuckt die letzten Worte mit einer besonderen Verbitterung aus.{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai été indulgent, c'est vrai. Et j'ai fini par le payer au prix fort. Voyez plutôt la dévastation autour de nous. Les insurgés n'ont presque rien laissé de mon foyer... » {n}Le gardien crache les derniers mots avec une profonde amertume.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été indulgent, c'est vrai. Et j'ai fini par le payer au prix fort. Regardez donc la dévastation autour de nous, les insurgés n'ont presque rien laissé de mon foyer... » {n}Le gardien crache les derniers mots avec une profonde amertume.{/n}

languages.text: “我确实很仁慈，而我也为此付出了惨重的代价。看看我们周围的废墟吧，那群叛徒几乎没有给我的家园留下任何东西……”{n}费雷克吐出最后几个字的时候，带着某种特别的苦涩之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我确实很仁慈，而我也为此付出了惨重的代价。看看我们周围的废墟吧，那群叛徒几乎没有给我的家园留下任何东西……”{n}费雷克吐出最后几个字的时候，带着某种特别的苦涩之意。{/n}

languages.text: 「寛容であったのは事実だ。そして結局、そのせいで高い代償を払うことになった。この酷い有り様を見てくれ。反乱者は我が家からほとんど全てを奪ったんだ…」{n}保持者は、語尾を荒げて言う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「大目に見たのだ、本当だ。そして結局、そのせいで高い代償を払うことになった。辺りの有り様を見てくれ。反乱者は我が家からほとんど全てを奪ったんだ…」{n}管理人は、言葉の最後の方を刺々しく吐き出すように言った。{/n}
「寛容であったのは事実だ。そして結局、そのせいで高い代償を払うことになった。この酷い有り様を見てくれ。反乱者は我が家からほとんど全てを奪ったんだ…」{n}保持者は、語尾を荒げて言う。{/n}

languages.text: «Fui permisivo, lo admito. Y ya ve el precio que hemos pagado por ello... solo tiene que ver la destrucción que nos rodea. Esos rebeldes casi han arrasado mi hogar por completo...». {n}El guardián escupe esas últimas palabras con especial amargura.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Fui permisivo, sí. Y ya ve el precio que hemos pagado por ello... solo tiene que ver las ruinas que nos rodean. Esos rebeldes casi han destruido mi hogar por completo...». {n}El guardián escupe esas últimas palabras con especial amargura.{/n}

languages.text: "Müsamaha gösterdiğim doğrudur. Ceremesini de çekiyorum, hâlimizi görüyorsun işte. İsyancılar evimden geriye tek bir şey bile bırakmadı." {n}Sorumlu'nun son sözleri, ağzından daha bir hışımla, âdeta tükürürcesine dökülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was lenient — this is true. And in the end I paid a steep price for it — just look at the destruction around us. The insurgents have left almost nothing of my home..." {n}The Keeper spits out the last few words with particular bitterness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Müsamaha gösterdiğim doğrudur. Ceremesini de çekiyorum, hâlimizi görüyorsun işte. İsyancılar evimden geriye tek bir şey bile bırakmadı." {n}Sorumlu'nun son sözleri, ağzından daha bir hışımla, âdeta tükürürcesine dökülüyor.{/n}
